sentences.sentence: There are vague promises of manufacturing fuel from herbs or powering cars with hydrogen.
sentences.translation: 植物制造燃料或者用氢气来驱动汽车是有可能的。

sentences.sentence: After more flight testing with the sun-powering HB-SIA, the Solar Impulse Team hopes to perform night testing later this year.
sentences.translation: HB-SIA 完成多次的太阳能飞行测试之后，阳光推动团队希望今年晚些时候进行夜间飞行测试。

sentences.sentence: At the same time, nearly half of U.S. carbon emissions come from heating, cooling and powering our homes, offices and other buildings.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，美国人近一半的碳排放来自供暖、制冷以及为家庭、办公室和其他建筑供电。
